PICARD:: PICARD: I am Jean-Luc Picard, Captain of the Enterprise. We come in peace.
PICARD: I am Jean-Luc Picard, of the Federation Starship, USSEnterprise.
PICARD: I'm not a family man, Riker, and yet, Starfleet has given me a ship with children aboard.
PICARD: I'm not accustomed to seeing an unsatisfactory rating for one of my crew.
TROI:: TROI: I am only half Betazoid. My father was a Starfleet officer.
TROI: I am not a mind control expert. I came here because I sensed you were in pain.
TROI: I'm Deanna Troi, Ship's Counsellor.
TROI: I'm the ship's Counsellor and I thought you might want to talk.
DATA:: DATA: I am the culmination of oneman's dream. When Doctor Soong created me he added to the substance of the universe. I must protect his dream.
DATA: I am superior, sir, in many ways. But I would gladly give it up to be human.
DATA: I am an android. I am Lieutenant Commander Data of the Federation Starship Enterprise.
DATA: I am Data. An android.
DATA: There are still many human emotions I do not fully comprehend. Anger, hatred, revenge. But I am not mystified by the desire to be loved or the need for friendship.
DATA: I am hopeful that one day I will discover my own humanity.
RIKER:: RIKER: I am Commander William T Riker.
RIKER: I am First Officer William Riker of the Enterprise.
RIKER: I'm just an average, everyday human who happens to be a Commander.
RIKER: I wonder, Captain. I'm not usually one for distrust at first sight, but this may be an exception.
